blocks.title: Privacy Policy
blocks.subtitle: Data & Cookies
blocks.text:
Webdevamin ('we', 'us', 'our') operates the website https://webdevamin.com. This privacy policy describes how we handle personal data when you use our website.

1. Data Controller

The data controller for your data is Webdevamin, which can be reached via amin@webdevamin.com.

2. Data Collection and Use

We do not collect personal data directly, but we use the following services that may collect data:

  • Google Analytics: for website analysis and usage statistics
  • Facebook Pixel: for marketing purposes
  • Cloudflare: for hosting and security
  • Brevo: for email communication

These services may collect different types of data according to their own privacy policies.

3. Legal Basis for Processing

We process data based on:

  • Consent: Through our cookie banner, you can explicitly consent to the use of analytical and marketing cookies.
  • Legitimate Interest: For understanding our audience and improving our services.

4. Data Transfer

Some data is processed outside the European Economic Area (EEA), for example by Google Analytics. This transfer is protected by appropriate safeguards, including Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC).

5. Retention Period

Data collected via Google Analytics is automatically deleted after the set retention period of 14 months. Aggregated, anonymized data may be retained indefinitely.

6. Security

We implement the following security measures:

  • Data encryption via HTTPS/TLS
  • IP anonymization in Google Analytics
  • Limited access controls
  • Regular security updates
  • Firewall and malware protection

7. Your Rights

Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

  • Right to information about the processing of your data
  • Right to access your data
  • Right to rectification of incorrect data
  • Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
  • Right to restriction of processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object to processing
  • Right not to be subject to automated decision-making

For questions about your rights, you can contact us via amin@webdevamin.com.

8. Cookies

We use cookies for:

  • Analytical purposes (Google Analytics)
  • Marketing purposes (Facebook Pixel)

You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie banner or your browser settings.

9. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Changes will be published on this page.

10. Contact

For questions about this privacy policy or your data, you can contact us via amin@webdevamin.com.

Last update: January 28, 2025
